g.text: ask to register a new employee
requests employee data(Name,Address, Phone Number, E-Mail, "soc")
CreateEmployee(Name, Address, Phone Number, E-Mail, "soc", Role)
CreateEmployee(Name, Address, Phone Number, E-Mail, "soc", Role)
emp = Employee(ID,Name, Address, Phone Number, E-Mail, "soc", Role)
shows all data and requests confirmation
